caption: The video seems to be a segment from a film featuring a bank employee, portrayed as a well-dressed and physically imposing man. The calm of his routine life is shattered when a group of robbers forcefully breaches the bank vault and hauls away the valuables with a vehicle. This prompts the burly employee to leap into action, pursuing the thieves in a high-speed car chase. Despite the prolonged and intense pursuit, the banker in the suit fails to stop the robbers from escaping with the loot. The chase ends dramatically as he himself is forced off a bridge by the criminals' car and plunges into the sea below.
